about_the_game:
"LIMINOPHOBIA" is a game about exploring liminal pools, where each level is not just a visual delight but also a deep dive into thoughts about life, desires, and self-discovery.

There are no monsters, and no one is chasing you. You can stay underwater for as long as you like.

"LIMINOPHOBIA" features photorealistic environments and realistic water interactions created with Unreal Engine 5 and ray tracing technology, providing a unique immersive experience.

Each level represents a new dimension of your inner self.

Consciousness

Begin your journey in a vibrant and familiar world, where every movement reveals new facets of perception. Explore ordinary yet astonishing landscapes filled with memories and thoughts that shape your reality.

Subconscious

As you dive deeper, you'll enter mysterious and surreal spaces where your hidden fears and hopes come to life. Here, you'll encounter images that challenge you to reflect on what truly drives you.

Desires

In this level, you'll find yourself in a realm where your most cherished desires take form. Explore vivid and enticing landscapes filled with temptations and opportunities that could alter your fate.

Sins

Here, you'll confront the darker sides of your being. Navigate through shadowy and intricate corridors where your fears and regrets become tangible. Face trials that reveal how they influence your life.

Ego

Immerse yourself in tranquil waters where the ego dissolves, and you find harmony within yourself. Discover the true nature of your existence and uncover the path to inner peace.

LIMINOPHOBIA reflects and complements the ideas of "Poolrooms", "Backrooms Pools", "Backrooms", "Liminal spaces" and "Found footage".

The Poolrooms concept is Jared Pike was the main influence on the idea of ​​the game.

name: Liminophobia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Walking and Swimming Simulator. No monsters. Explore liminal spaces where each level reflects different aspects of your mind. Savor the atmosphere and let your feelings guide you. Relax or feel anxious as you dive underwater. Overcome your fears in uncanny, unnerving, and eerie spaces.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Czech, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
